data.actual_result: The in-game preview is set to the same transparency when the overlay is open.
data.expected_result: The In-game preview updates with movement of the slider.
data.short_description: [Overlay] Opacity Slider no longer works in the In-game Preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game with Overlay - Open Overlay - Unpin chat - Open the Opacity option in the top right corner of chat - Move the slider.
